item.title: AI’s Impact On Employment Is Negligible, Study Asserts
item.description: Money keeps pouring into AI and technology-related investments, but there is no evidence at this point as to its impact on jobs one way or another.

item.title: Meta AI Context Boost, Valve Reveals Mini PC And VR Headset, ElevenLabs Opens Voice Market
item.description: AR glasses gain real time visual context, Valve prepares new PC and VR hardware, and ElevenLabs launches a licensed voice market.
